main event: Reported sighting of several objects flying in a V-formation disappearing towards the horizon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes., The objects were reported to hover and move from east to west before disappearing., No radar detection was made during the time of the sighting., The observer described the object as bright, small, reddish-white, and oval., There was an inquiry suggesting that the observer may have had an operative imagination.
witness description: Ray KNOX, an observer in the area
